bonePile.title: [name] uses Bone Pile!
bonePile.desc: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you drop to 1 hit point instead. If you do, reduce yourself to a pile of bones, render yourself prone, and you are considered to be under the effects of a Feign Death spell. While subject to this condition, you are unable to move or take actions other than using an action to end this effect. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

unnaturalVitality.title: [name] uses Unnatural Vitality!
unnaturalVitality.desc: When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you may choose to stay conscious instead of falling unconscious. If you do, you gain temporary hit points equal to your total character level. In this state, you may take an action or bonus action on your turn, but not both, and you make death saving throws at the end of your turn as usual. You can remain in this state until you fail your first death saving throw, at which point you fall unconscious and continue as usual, or you die outright to massive damage. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

racialPoison.title: [name] uses Racial Poison!
racialPoison.desc:
As part of a long rest you can distill poison from your own glands. You gain a number of doses of racial poison equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down) which last 24 hours before drying. You can use a dose of this poison to coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition. Applying the poison takes an action.

A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition takes an additional 1d4 poison damage. This damage increases to 1d6 when you reach 6th level, and to 1d8 when you reach 14th level. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute before drying. Hitting a target with a weapon or piece of ammunition that is poisoned this way will not remove the poison before that minute has passed.
racialPoison.effectdesc:
A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition takes an additional 1d{scale} poison damage.

lizardJaws.title: [name] uses their Hungry Jaws feature!
lizardJaws.desc: As a bonus action, you make a special attack with your bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points (minimum of 1) equal to your Constitution modifier, and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

tauntCharisma.title: [name] uses their Taunt feature!
tauntCharisma.desc:
You have an extraordinary ability to fluster creatures. As a bonus action, you can unleash a string of provoking words at a creature within 60 feet of yourself that can hear and understand you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or it has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the start of your next turn. The DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier (choose when you select this race).

You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
tauntCharisma.effectdesc: The target disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than [name] until the start of [name]'s next turn.
